suppressions.reason: Math.random fallback is intentional — crypto.randomUUID is primary, crypto.getRandomValues is secondary, Math.random is last-resort for ancient browsers where security is already compromised
Current implementation is readable and performant for <5000 items — premature optimization, DOM rendering dominates cost
Function is called from settings-listeners.js via global scope — single-file dead code analysis is a false positive in this 67-script architecture

prompt_exclusions: This is a vanilla JS single-page app with no build step — do not suggest framework migrations or build tool additions
Do not modify constants.js version numbers — versioning is managed externally by the /release skill
Do not add new files without updating sw.js CORE_ASSETS and index.html script order
Do not flag localStorage.getItem/setItem for scalar string preferences (timeout keys, boolean flags) — this is intentional
Do not flag Math.random() fallback in generateUUID — crypto.randomUUID and crypto.getRandomValues are primary, Math.random is last-resort only
Do not optimize filterInventoryAdvanced — dataset is <5000 items, DOM rendering dominates cost
Do not remove functions that appear unused without checking all 67 scripts in the global-scope dependency chain — single-file analysis produces false positives
